rect.style: fill: rgb(216, 216, 216); paint-order: stroke; stroke: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); visibility: hidden;

path.style: stroke-width: 10px; stroke: url(#color-0); fill: rgba(216, 216, 216, 0); stroke-linecap: round; stroke-dasharray: 30; stroke-dashoffset: -41px;
fill: rgba(216, 216, 216, 0); stroke: url(#color-0); stroke-width: 10px; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-dasharray: 30px;
